name: Welcome Landing Page
description: A simple landing page with a welcome message and a button to navigate between small projects.

name: Number Guessing Game
description: A simple number guessing game where you have to guess a number between 1 and 20.

name: Dice Game
description: A simple dice game where you have to roll the dice and the first player to reach 100 points wins. I have build this project during my JavaScript course by Jonas Schmedtmann.

name: Fast Pay
description: A simple website for a company called Fast Pay. I have build this project during my Web Technologies course. I have used HTML, CSS and JavaScript to build this website. It is just a static website.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A simple tic tac toe game where you can play with your friend. I have build this project using pure JavaScript. You can play with your friend or with computer. I adjust the site for mobile view as well.

name: Matching Game
description: A simple matching game where you have to match the cards. I have build this project using pure JavaScript. I made card as football clubs logo. You can play with your friend or with computer. I adjust the site for mobile view as well.

name: Natours App
description: A simple website for a company called Natours. I have build this project during my Advanced CSS and Sass course by Jonas Schmedtmann. I have used HTML, CSS and JavaScript to build this website. It is just a static website.

name: React Tube
description: A simple YouTube clone app. I have build this project using React. I have used YouTube API to fetch the data. I have used Redux for state management. I have used Axios to fetch the data from YouTube API. I have used MUI React for styling.

name: React Weather App
description: A simple weather app. I have build this project using React. I have used Open Weather API to fetch the data. I have used Redux for state management. I have used Axios to fetch the data from Open Weather API.

name: React Player
description: A simple video player app. I have build this project using React. I have used Redux for state management. User can select folder contains music files and play them. I have used JavaScript FileReader API to read the files.
